name: SipsJam 2016 - That's not on fire.
description:
Music by HolFix https://www.youtube.com/user/holfix everything else by me (rev-c/mazhem)

Done in less than 48 hours for SipsJam 2016

Made entirely in Twine, because that's the perfect software for point and click adventures right?!

I recommend playing in full screen.

INSTRUCTIONS

Click on one thing, you can then try to click on other things to see if it does anything. If you can't click on anything, deselect the thing you've originally clicked and try with another object.

If you can do something with the two objects an option will appear in the text.

Everything can either be set on fire, or used to create a fire.
